tool.name: SAGA.shapes_tools.6
tool.description: Copy Selection to New Shapes Layer
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.shapes_tools.6 INPUT $INPUT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Input
param.help: Input The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Copies selected shapes to a new shapes layer.
